subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Juventus won its 28th Serie A title and first in nine years after it beat Cagliari, 2-0, and second-place A.C. Milan lost to Inter Milan, 4-2, in the next-to-last games.
snippet: Juventus won its 28th Serie A title and first in nine years after it beat Cagliari, 2-0, and second-place A.C. Milan lost to Inter Milan, 4-2, in the next-to-last games.
